body:
Thanks, Mostapha, for the clarification.



I noticed that in your youtube tutorial video on [gendaymtx](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=s3stJVyaRmg), you have two components indicated as TregenzaSky and ReinhartSkyMtx, respectively. Are these components valid only during that particular GH session? i.e. once that GH file is closed and reopen, the two sky matrix need to be re-created?
